mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, 1870 February 14
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, February 14, 1870. Mount Vernon. Oilcloth for second story hall, clock on stairway. Mr. Strider agent for Washington relics. Masons plan marble front to vault. Asks about New York's $500 contribution. Regrets Washington relics on market when Association lacks funds.
